message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you.  I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
Alice, $20,000 is way outside my budget. I'm really interested in this product, but I can't go higher than $12,000.  What do you think?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $20,000 represents the true value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $17,000. This is my final offer.
Alice, $17,000 is still too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $14,000. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to accept, I'm going to have to look elsewhere.
